mission: Marvel Comics origin: MIT GRADUATION PANEL! Young Bibi emerges, perfect English speech bubble! American swagger lines! 'MR. SECURITY' glows like arc reactor! CHEST BEAM! Election panel: Defeats Peres by 1%! 'NARROW VICTORY!' Western Wall tunnel opening: PORTAL TO CHAOS! Spirits escape! WHOOSH! Peace process DISSOLVES like Spider-Man! Particle effects! Scandal montage panels: Cigars! Champagne! Sara RAGE MODE! 'HULK SARA SMASH!' Coalition collapse: Heroes scatter! DISBANDING! Landslide loss panel: 'I'LL BE BACK!' Mirror practice panel: 'One day... LONGEST SERVING!' Post-credit tease!

script_processing.original_script: Distinguished faculty, esteemed guests, and fellow graduates. Today marks a momentous occasion. My name is Bibi Netanyahu. I hail from Israel. And I am ready to lead. Mr. Security glows with an inner power. Behold, the chest beam of influence! Narrow victory! Just one percent separates me from my opponent. The people have spoken. The Western Wall tunnel opening unleashes a portal. Chaos and spirits escape, dissolving peace. Cigars and champagne flow. Sara enters RAGE MODE. Hulk Sara smash these political foes! The coalition has collapsed. My heroic allies have scattered. Disbanding the ranks now. I will be back. I will practice in mirrors. One day, I will be the longest serving leader.
script_processing.final_script: Distinguished faculty, esteemed guests, fellow graduates. Today marks a momentous occasion. My name is Bibi Netanyahu; I am from Israel. I am ready to lead.  A narrow victory, just one percent separated me from my opponent. The people have spoken. The Western Wall tunnel opening unleashed chaos. Spirits escaped, dissolving peace.  Cigars and champagne flowed; a celebratory atmosphere filled the air.  Sara, however, entered a furious rage.  She unleashed her anger upon my political foes. The coalition unexpectedly collapsed. My heroic allies scattered. I disbanded the ranks. I will return, stronger and more determined.  I will practice in mirrors, honing my image. One day, I will be the longest-serving leader. My vision for Israel is clear, unwavering, and powerful. I will not be deterred. I will prevail.
